metaDescription: Discover SEA ESSENCE in Calpe by URMOSA. Modern 2-bedroom apartments from €379,445. Delivered January 2026. Near beaches, golf, and amenities.

content.heroIntro: SEA ESSENCE represents a compelling investment opportunity in the heart of Calpe's most desirable coastal district. Developed by URMOSA, a trusted name in Costa Blanca residential construction, this project delivers modern 2-bedroom apartments in the prestigious Estacion de ciudadouero location. With completion scheduled for 01-01-2026, SEA ESSENCE offers contemporary living just minutes from the award-winning Arenal-Bol Blue Flag beach and world-class golf facilities. Starting from €379,445, these thoughtfully designed apartments feature premium finishes, climate control, and access to communal amenities that define Mediterranean lifestyle excellence. Whether you're seeking a primary residence, holiday retreat, or investment property with strong rental potential (€1,000 per week), SEA ESSENCE combines strategic location, architectural quality, and market value that positions it 20% below comparable Jávea properties. The development attracts an established expatriate community—particularly British and German residents—where English is widely spoken and international amenities abound.

locationSection.intro: Located in Estacion de ciudadouero, Calpe, SEA ESSENCE sits at the intersection of coastal charm and cosmopolitan convenience. This vibrant district has evolved into one of the Costa Blanca's most sought-after residential areas, attracting discerning buyers who value authentic Mediterranean living with modern infrastructure. The neighborhood benefits from Calpe's natural beauty—dramatic rock formations, crystalline waters, and golden beaches—while maintaining excellent transport connections and international services. The presence of a strong expatriate community ensures English-speaking healthcare providers, quality schools, and familiar retail experiences. Just 30 minutes from Alicante Airport and with new TRAM connections arriving soon, Estacion de ciudadouero offers the perfect balance: peaceful coastal living with seamless access to broader regional amenities. Property values here have demonstrated impressive +7% year-on-year growth, reflecting sustained investor confidence and limited new supply.
highlights: Beach: Arenal-Bol (Blue Flag) - 800 meters, Cantal Roig - 1.2 km
Golf: Club de Golf Ifach - 5 minutes, Don Cayo - 20 minutes, La Sella - 30 minutes
Hospital: Hospital de Dénia - 30 minutes, Centro de Salud Calp - 10 minutes
Shopping: Mercadona, Consum, Lidl, Mas y Mas within 5-10 minutes
Restaurants: International dining and traditional Spanish cuisine within walking distance

propertyFeatures.intro: SEA ESSENCE apartments exemplify contemporary Spanish coastal construction standards, with URMOSA's commitment to quality evident in every detail. Each residence features thermally efficient construction utilizing double-glazed windows with thermal breaks, ensuring year-round climate comfort while reducing energy consumption. The interior layouts maximize natural light and Mediterranean views, with premium ceramic flooring throughout living areas and moisture-resistant finishes in wet zones. URMOSA's attention to detail extends from structural integrity to aesthetic refinement, with all apartments benefiting from modern electrical installations, pre-installation conduits for air conditioning, and integrated security systems.
features: Communal swimming pool with landscaped gardens
Air conditioning pre-installation for future integration
Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances
Double-glazed windows with thermal break technology
Modern bathroom fixtures with quality sanitaryware

content.investmentSection: SEA ESSENCE represents a strategically sound investment within a market demonstrating robust fundamentals. Calpe's property market has appreciated 7% year-on-year, outpacing broader Costa Blanca trends and reflecting genuine supply-demand dynamics. At €379,445 starting price (approximately €3,418 per square meter), SEA ESSENCE offers exceptional value positioning—approximately 20% below comparable properties in neighboring Jávea, while maintaining superior location advantages. The rental market validates strong investor returns, with similar coastal properties commanding €1,000 per week during peak season. URMOSA's reputation for timely delivery and quality construction enhances asset security, while Calpe's established expatriate infrastructure ensures consistent rental demand from international tourists and long-term residents. The impending TRAM expansion will further elevate accessibility and property desirability, making January 2026 delivery timing particularly advantageous for market positioning.
whyBuySection: Strategic beachfront location in Estacion de ciudadouero, Calpe's most desirable district
Trusted developer: URMOSA, with proven track record of quality construction and timely delivery
Exceptional value: 20% less expensive than comparable Jávea properties with superior location
Strong rental income potential: €1,000+ per week in peak season
Completion: 01-01-2026 with 10-year structural warranty from developer
Vibrant expatriate community: Strong British and German presence with English widely spoken
Immediate beach access: Arenal-Bol (Blue Flag) just 800 meters away
World-class golf: Club de Golf Ifach (5 minutes), Don Cayo (20 minutes), La Sella (30 minutes)

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in SEA ESSENCE?
faqs.answer: SEA ESSENCE apartments start from €379,445. The development features 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom units with 111 square meters of built area. Current availability is limited with only 1 unit remaining. Contact us via WhatsApp for current pricing and availability details.

faqs.question: When will SEA ESSENCE be completed?
faqs.answer: SEA ESSENCE is scheduled for completion on 01-01-2026. URMOSA provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. Specific unit delivery schedules are available upon inquiry—we recommend early contact to secure your preferred completion timeline.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of SEA ESSENCE?
faqs.answer: URMOSA is the developer of SEA ESSENCE. They are an established builder with significant experience constructing quality residential properties throughout Calpe and the broader Costa Blanca region, known for reliability, quality finishes, and timely delivery.

faqs.question: Is Calpe a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Calpe is an excellent location for property investment and residence. The area features a strong, established British and German expatriate community where English is widely spoken. The property market demonstrates +7% year-on-year appreciation. Key amenities include Hospital de Dénia (30 minutes), award-winning Arenal-Bol Blue Flag beach, world-class golf facilities, and excellent shopping and dining. Combined with lower property costs than Jávea and strong rental market demand, Calpe offers compelling value and lifestyle benefits.

faqs.question: How far is SEA ESSENCE from the beach?
faqs.answer: SEA ESSENCE is exceptionally close to the beach—just 800 meters from Arenal-Bol, which holds Blue Flag status for water quality and safety. Cantal Roig beach is 1.2 kilometers away, and other excellent beaches including La Fossa and Les Bassetes are within easy reach, ensuring direct access to Calpe's finest coastal amenities.

faqs.question: What amenities are near SEA ESSENCE?
faqs.answer: SEA ESSENCE enjoys proximity to comprehensive amenities: Mercadona, Consum, and Lidl supermarkets within 5-10 minutes; Hospital de Dénia (30 minutes) and Centro de Salud Calp (10 minutes) for healthcare; Club de Golf Ifach (5 minutes) for golf; and numerous restaurants and shops within walking distance. International schools including Lady Elizabeth School (10 minutes) and Laude Newton College (35 minutes) serve expatriate families.

content.conclusion: SEA ESSENCE presents a rare opportunity to acquire modern Mediterranean living at compelling value in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable locations. URMOSA's commitment to quality construction, combined with Estacion de ciudadouero's exceptional amenities, appreciating market fundamentals, and strong rental potential, creates a compelling investment proposition. Whether you're seeking a personal coastal retreat, holiday rental investment, or primary residence in an English-speaking expatriate community, SEA ESSENCE delivers on all fronts. With only 1 unit available and completion approaching January 2026, immediate action is recommended to secure your preferred property. Contact us today via WhatsApp for detailed floor plans, current pricing, and to arrange a virtual or in-person viewing. Our specialists are ready to guide you through every step of the purchase process and answer any specific questions about SEA ESSENCE or Calpe properties.
